ComicInfo.Summary:
“WAR TO 300,” Part Two
LAST ISSUE BEFORE SPAWN 300!
Witness the debut of TODD McFARLANE’s newest creation—The Rapture! Heaven’s answer to the mythic Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse, these eternal warriors are tasked with eliminating the plague called humanity from the face of the Earth. The WAR TO 300 rages! Next month, new allegiances will form, new enemies will rise, and history will be made!
HOLLYWOOD NEWS! Soon to be a major motion picture from Blumhouse Productions, directed by Todd McFarlane, and starring Jamie Foxx as Spawn and Jeremy Renner as Twitch.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------------------|------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Todd McFarlane & Greg Menzie | 1 | | B | Virgin Cover B | Todd McFarlane & Greg Menzie | 2 | | C | Black & White Cover C | Todd McFarlane | 3 | | RE | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Todd McFarlane | 4 |
*Notes:* The Cover A, Virgin Cover B and Black & White Cover C are a homage of the cover of The Amazing Spider-Man #299.
